constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 47 (Friday, March 12, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. AMODEI:
H.R. 1869.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The constitutional authority on which this bill rests is
the power of Congress to authorize Appropriations under
Article I, Section 9 of the United States Constitution.
[Page H1364]
title: Technical Correction to the Shoshone-Paiute Tribes of the Duck Valley Reservation Water Rights Settlement Act of 2021
